name: cfinvoke
description:
Does either of the following:

 * Invokes a component method from within a CFML page or
 component.
 * Invokes a web service.
 Different attribute combonations make some attributes required
 at sometimes and not at others.

params.name: component
params.description:
String or component object; a reference to a component, or
 component to instantiate.

params.name: method
params.description:
Name of a method. For a web service, the name of an
 operation.

params.name: returnvariable
params.description: Name of a variable for the invocation result.

params.name: argumentcollection
params.description:
Name of a structure; associative array of arguments to pass
 to the method.

params.name: username
params.description: Overrides username specified in Administrator > Web Services

params.name: password
params.description: Overrides passowrd specified in Administrator > Web Services

params.name: webservice
params.description: The URL of the WSDL file for the web service.

params.name: timeout
params.description: The timeout for the web service request, in seconds

params.name: proxyserver
params.description: The proxy server required to access the webservice URL.

params.name: proxyport
params.description: The port to use on The proxy server.

params.name: proxyuser
params.description: The user ID to send to the proxy server.

params.name: proxypassword
params.description: The user's password on the proxy server.

params.name: serviceport
params.description:
The port name for the web service. This value is
 case-sensitive and corresponds to the port element's
 name attribute under the service element. Specify this
 attribute if the web service contains multiple ports.
 Default: first port found in the WSDL.

params.name: refreshwsdl
params.description:
* yes: reload the WSDL file and regenerate the artifacts used to consume the web service
 * no

params.name: wsdl2javaargs
params.description: A string that contains a space-delimited list of arguments to pass to the WSDL2Java tool that generates Java stubs for the web services.
